# PLAYER::SET_PLAYER_CAN_USE_COVER

## Summary
Sets if the player can use cover

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** canUseCover

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether this player can take cover.
